text: Hi there , I am trying to add the chatbot  to my Shopify. However, when adding the code provided it does something really strange. It works well on the computer screen, but it changes the title when loading the site on the phone .. Anyone here knows why that can be happening? As I have followed the steps in order to copy the code in the spaces shown .   Thank you

Hi Olia! Good morning!
I solved the issue on Friday, I found the line on code on the my css and I customized it :smile:
Thank you so much for you message!

<@U01TBPMEZ63> I am removing this message at is appears it includes a partial of your API key on the image screenshot so I would advise you please rotate you API key just in case.

If you can reupload the image with the access tokens/api keys blurred it would be safer.
